attributes.action: Unlawful Muslim extremism to be banned
attributes.additional_details: We urge the government to introduce immediate law to stop the current muslim radicalism together with other parties that has beset our country for too long. Laws to stop the burning of national flags, abuse of citizens, abuse of our troops, massive abuse of property, attempts to 'introduce' Sharia law and all manner of dispruptive activity. This should also include hate preachers. Deportation and imprisonment an immediate option.
